results.description: Gerard Deulofeu's goal after 76 seconds sets Watford on their way to a first Premier League win of the season.
results.shortTitle: Watford off bottom with first league win
results.title: Norwich City 0-2 Watford: Hornets' first win of season lifts them off bottom

results.description: Norwich head coach Daniel Farke says his side's 2-0 loss at home to Watford was a "disaster" after conceding the first goal in the second minute.
results.title: Norwich 0-2 Watford: Farke calls Hornets defeat a 'disaster'

results.description: Head coach Quique Sanchez Flores praises the strength of his 10-man Watford side after they beat Norwich 2-0 to secure their first Premier League win of the season.
results.title: Norwich 0-2 Watford: Hornets strength pleases Flores

results.description: Mark Lawrenson takes on 'The Irishman' star Stephen Graham to make predictions for the latest round of Premier League fixtures.
results.shortTitle: Liverpool to beat Man City and go nine clear?
results.title: Premier League predictions: Lawro vs 'The Irishman' star Stephen Graham

results.description: Paulton Rovers president Les Rogers tells BBC Points West how the windfall from their 2009 FA Cup first-round tie against Norwich City is still helping.
results.shortTitle: 'How our club prospered after FA Cup windfall'
results.title: FA cup first round: Paulton Rovers still seeing impact of 2009 cup windfall

thumbnail.altText: 'How our club prospered after FA Cup windfall'

results.description: Watford beat Norwich in the Premier League - listen to BBC Radio 5 Live and text reaction.
results.shortTitle: Premier League: Norwich 0-2 Watford - Hornets earn first win of season
results.title: Norwich City v Watford latest in the Premier League

results.description: Norwich manager Daniel Farke says he will take some of the blame for Brighton's second goal as he made a substitution before a decisive set piece that led to Shane Duffy securing victory for the hosts.
results.shortTitle: I take some of the blame for Brighton's second goal - Farke
results.title: Brighton 2-0 Norwich: I take some blame for Brighton's second goal - Farke

results.description: Brighton boss Graham Potter says his side "deserved" the 2-0 victory over Norwich to secure their third successive home win in the Premier League.
results.title: Brighton 2-0 Norwich: 'Deserved victory' pleases Potter

results.description: Substitutes Leandro Trossard and Shane Duffy earn Brighton their second successive league win and condemn Norwich to their fifth defeat in six matches.
results.title: Brighton & Hove Albion 2-0 Norwich City

thumbnail.altText: Leandro Trossard in action for Brighton

results.description: Mark Lawrenson makes his predictions for the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

results.title: Premier League predictions: Lawro looks at this weekend's top-flight games

results.description: Brighton take on Norwich in the Premier League - follow Final Score and live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Brighton and Hove Albion v Norwich City
results.title: Brighton and Hove Albion v Norwich in the Premier League

results.description: Chelsea beat Watford in the Premier League after Liverpool and Man City win - watch Final Score, listen to BBC Radio 5 Live Sports and extra and follow live text commentary.
results.shortTitle: Ben Foster denied Watford leveller as Chelsea hang on - reaction
results.title: Premier League latest: Man City and Liverpool among those in action after Bournemouth beat Manchester United

results.description: Norwich boss Daniel Farke says he doesn't blame VAR after a controversial penalty was awarded to Manchester United for a Ben Godfrey foul on Daniel James.
results.shortTitle: I don't blame VAR for defeat - Farke
results.title: Norwich 1-3 Man Utd: I don't blame VAR for defeat - Daniel Farke

results.description: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer praises Anthony Martial and says he is an "important player" for Manchester United following an impressive 3-1 win over Norwich.
results.shortTitle: Martial is a very important player for us - Solskjaer
results.title: Norwich 1-3 Man Utd: Martial is a very important player for us - Ole Gunnar Solskjaer

results.description: Manchester United win a Premier League away game for the first time since February despite Norwich keeper Tim Krul saving two penalties.
results.shortTitle: Man Utd beat Norwich to end bad away run
results.title: Man Utd beat Norwich 3-1 to end bad away run in Premier League

results.description: Norwich City defender Christoph Zimmermann surprises fans at the Premier League Kicks event at the club's Nest facility, which aims to give young people from deprived areas a safe space to get together.
results.shortTitle: Zimmermann surprises Norwich fans at Premier League Kicks event
results.title: Norwich City: Christoph Zimmermann visits Premier League Kicks event

results.description: Norwich manager Daniel Farke says a first clean sheet and away point of season in their draw at Bournemouth is "important" for his team's belief.
results.shortTitle: First away point important for belief - Farke
results.title: Bournemouth 0-0 Norwich: Canaries earn first away point

results.description: Mark Lawrenson takes on Strictly Come Dancing stars Alex Scott and Neil Jones to make predictions for the latest round of Premier League fixtures.

results.description: Norwich City boss Daniel Farke praises his sides performance, as the Canaries held Bournemouth to a goalless draw at Vitality Stadium.
results.shortTitle: Farke praises 'good result' for injury deprived Canaries
results.title: Bournemouth 0-0 Norwich: Farke praises 'good result' for injury deprived Canaries

results.description: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe says his side were missing their "mojo" in the final third, as the Cherries fought out a goaless draw at home to Norwich City.
results.title: Bournemouth 0-0 Norwich: Cherries were missing their 'mojo' - Eddie Howe
